text: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًا

translation.en.sahih: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.
translation.id.indonesian: dan (Kami binasakan) kaum 'Aad dan Tsamud dan penduduk Rass dan banyak (lagi) generasi-generasi di antara kaum-kaum tersebut.
